content.rendered:
FESTIVAL PASS 

Price : $100.00

Admission to all Festival events (excluding the Gala Winners Concert in Koerner Hall)
PLUS
Invitation to the Opening Concert Reception on October 17
Invitation to Founding Members Concert and Reception on October 20
Commemorative Program Book
